title: Banks may face cash deficit on tax outgo
description: The banking system in India saw a sharp decline in surplus liquidity due to quarterly advance tax payments and upcoming GST payments. This has led to increased borrowing costs for banks. Analysts expect the liquidity situation to improve by the end of the month as government spending accelerates.
